Reviews.Content: read reviews little sceptical stayed nights week found hotel staff friendly especially guy bar clean spacious represented value money plus atmosphere bar evening ive spent god nights 4 5 star hotels theres dog drinking expensive drinks bars week business hotel location value money ideal
